meanings.definition: The act of distributing something incorrectly or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: The teacher realized the misdistributions of candies among the students.
meanings.sent2: The misdistributions of resources led to chaos in the community.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party had a funny twist due to the misdistributions of party hats.
meanings.sent4: The misdistributions of power created a ripple effect in the organization.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of misdistributions stayed in their minds long after the event.

meanings.definition: The result of distributing something incorrectly or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: The company faced consequences due to the misdistributions of funds.
meanings.sent2: She witnessed the misdistributions of gifts during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The picnic became a comedy of errors because of the misdistributions of sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The misdistributions of opportunities left many feeling disheartened.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the misdistributions lingered, casting a shadow over the project.
